typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as short,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as short,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 keyGenerate(output(SURKEY as long),
	startAt: 1001L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['sgtfile.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> targetSurgKey
